name: You Have to Fly this Airline!
description:
You have to fly this airline!  Oman Air 787 Business Class

Oman Air is not airline I knew much about nor had I flown them before.  But this one flight from Bangkok to Muscat on their flagship 787 in business class has me hooked!  I'll definitely be flying them again.  Why? Because Oman Air has the best business class seat and bed in the sky. They offer dining on demand and their crew are really really good. 

Don't believe me? Watch this Oman Air flight review to find out exactly why I like them so much - and also what I really didn't like about Oman Air. 

This Oman Air business class review covers my entire journey with Oman Air from Bangkok to Muscat in the Boeing 787. This includes the Oman Air business class lounge at Bangkok airport, boarding, take off and the incredible inflight service from Oman Air.   

If you're new to my channel, welcome aboard and thanks for watching.  Please check out the rest of my channel and, if you like what you see, please subscribe.  I'm also on Twitter and Insta so follow me on there too. 

Happy Travels

Dennis

#omanair #businessclass #flightreview
